ygData.msgSnippet: (As long as we re spreading our respective propagandas around, vote for me. Why?  I was signed onto the Council not even a several weeks after joining the RPG

(As long as we're spreading our respective propagandas around, vote for me.  
Why?  I was signed onto the Council not even a several weeks after joining 
the RPG because I deserved it, because of my skill and experience, and my 
ideas, which I still bring to the RPG.  My moding enforcement I can happily 
say doesn't exist becuase there is no longer a need for it.

This new Council seems like things will actually happen instead of making a 
suggestion and everyone says "Oh, good idea." and nothing happens.  Though 
with this new Council, and if I'm on it, good things will happen, rules that 
will help out the "little guys".  If elected some of my rules may seem 
hipocritical since one or two I may be guilty of (and I'm not the only one), 
but that is how you learn.  Through experience, which I've got 5+ years of 
online RPing experience, all in RPGs very similar to this.  I may seem harsh 
at times, but I'm only acting in the best interests of the RPG.  

So vote for the KSLawDogg@...

-Uni

(Just want to say right now thanks to my loyal supporters, your aid has been 
most helpful and I'm most appreciative)
